statements: SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE id = 2;
SELECT phone_number, address FROM Volunteer WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM Volunteer;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT address, phone_number FROM Volunteer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, address FROM Volunteer WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) OR name = 'Alice' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule ORDER BY volunteer_id ASC, date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT volunteer_id, task_name, status FROM assignment WHERE status='assigned';
SELECT assignment_id, task_name, date FROM assignment WHERE date='2022-01-15';
SELECT volunteer_id, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE DATE = '2022-01-20';
SELECT * FROM assignment ORDER BY task_name DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE volunteer_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC
SELECT task_name, date FROM assignment WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT volunteer_id, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_schedule WHERE date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY volunteer_id ASC
SELECT assignment_id, task_name FROM assignment WHERE volunteer_id = 2 AND date >= '2022-02-01' AND date <= '2022-02-28' ORDER BY task_name DESC
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_assignments FROM assignment GROUP BY volunteer_id ORDER BY num_assignments DESC, volunteer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, status FROM Assignments WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, e.event_name AS event_name, a.status FROM Volunteers v INNER JOIN Assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Events e ON a.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Volunteers;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT assignment_id, Volunteers.name AS volunteer_name, Events.event_name, assignment_date, status FROM Assignments JOIN Volunteers ON Assignments.volunteer_id = Volunteers.volunteer_id JOIN Events ON Assignments.event_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY event_id, event_name HAVING total_assignments > 1 ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, volunteer_id, hours_worked FROM assignments WHERE hours_worked > 5;
SELECT * FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM volunteers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
SELECT v.volunteer_name, s.date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM volunteers v JOIN schedules s ON v.volunteer_id = s.volunteer_id WHERE s.date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT v.volunteer_name, a.hours_worked FROM volunteers v JOIN assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id WHERE a.hours_worked > 8;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, email, address FROM volunteers;
SELECT schedule_id, date, location, description FROM schedules;
SELECT volunteer_id, email, phone_number FROM volunteers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, email FROM volunteers WHERE address = '123 Main St'
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Community Center' ORDER BY start_time DESC

SELECT v.volunteer_name, a.assignment_date, t.task_name FROM assignments a JOIN volunteers v ON a.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN volunteer_tasks vt ON v.volunteer_id = vt.volunteer_id JOIN tasks t ON vt.task_id = t.task_id WHERE a.status = 'Completed'

SELECT v.volunteer_name, s.date, s.location, t.task_name FROM volunteers v LEFT JOIN assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id LEFT JOIN schedules s ON a.schedule_id = s.schedule_id LEFT JOIN volunteer_tasks vt ON v.volunteer_id = vt.volunteer_id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON vt.task_id = t.task_id
SELECT v.volunteer_name, COUNT(a.assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM volunteers v LEFT JOIN assignments a ON v.volunteer_id = a.volunteer_id GROUP BY v.volunteer_id HAVING total_assignments > 5
